item.description:
Boston Value Investing Group

This is our third Value Investing meeting. Anyone interested in Warren Buffett or Benjamin Graham-based investing is invited.

The meeting format is as follows:
Raimondas Lencevicius will present Harley Davidson (HOG).
  • Harley Davidson 10K can be found here: http://sec.gov/Archiv...
  • Latest 10Q can be found here: http://sec.gov/Archiv...


Please read the financial statements and any historical information about the company beforehand. We will have in depth discussion about multiple aspects of this company. Please prepare questions.


The meeting minutes of the 10/31/08 meeting are here (in text form) and here (in Word form).


We will meet at the entrance doors of MIT's Stata Center at 6:30pm. Specifically, the meeting point is the entrance to Building 32 (also known as the Gates Building) on Main Street and Vassar Street. We will then use room G725 in the Stata Center. The doors are only accessible with an MIT card, so please arrive on time. Here's a campus map showing the Stata Center: http://whereis.mit.ed...
item.name: Boston Value Investing Group
